data.title: Hitler Youth Member Solomon Perel, Who Became a Nazi to Survive, Dies at 97
data.meta_description: ‘I Hadn’t Pretended to Be a Hitler Youth, but Instead Had Become a Hitler Youth to the Extent That I Wanted a German Victory,’ the German-born Holocaust Survivor Recounted
